en-US.summary: BEA Pumpkin Pi - Voice-First Educational Audio Technology for Echo Dot & All Alexa Devices
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Pumpkin Pi to teach me about audio
Alexa, tell Pumpkin Pi to explain beatboxing
Alexa, ask Pumpkin Pi about spatial audio concepts
en-US.name: BEA Pumpkin Pi
en-US.description: Voice-first educational audio technology learning platform optimized for Amazon Echo Dot and all Alexa-enabled devices. Perfect for screenless devices! Learn about spatial audio concepts, beatboxing techniques, sound engineering principles, and audio technology through interactive voice conversation. Enhanced with BEA emotional intelligence for personalized learning experiences. No screen required - all interactions are voice-based. Transform your Echo Dot into an engaging audio education companion through conversation alone.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Test the skill by saying 'Alexa, ask Pumpkin Pi to teach me about audio' or 'Alexa, tell Pumpkin Pi to explain frequency'
